desc.p: Name of the clearing system that the Depository is linked to.
Input must be one of the following ; EUROCLEAR, CEDEL, KASSENVER, KAS ASSOC, SEGA, BNB or OTHER.
The ID of the Depository that this Securities Clearing record
Must exist on the CUSTOMER file.
You should enter here the account / id by which your Organisation is known within the Clearing System.
Input either 'Y' or 'NO' to indicate whether there is a direct link between the bank and the depository via the clearing system. No input will be treated as 'NO'.
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
